subject: Baseball
Mergers, Acquisitions and Divestitures
lead_paragraph: Jim Crane, a Houston businessman, reached a deal to acquire the Astros from the owner Drayton McLane for $680 million; the sale includes the lease on Minute Maid Park.
snippet: Jim Crane, a Houston businessman, reached a deal to acquire the Astros from the owner Drayton McLane for $680 million; the sale includes the lease on Minute Maid Park.
